venue.address_2: Wilson State Park,( Wickford Harbor), Intrepid Drive & Flat Fish Drive
venue.name: Wilson State Park

item.description: WaterSki and Ocean Adventure to Block Island and Back. Wilson State Park to launch. Wickford Harbor, Intrepid Drive & Flat Fish Drive (Wickford) North Kingstown RI 02852 Depart Newton. Target meeting at Wilson State Park at 10:20 AM Meet either at wilson park in RI or start from Peter Dwyer's House in Newton, MA (I am also thinking we could also go to Scituate; Depending on your thoughts) Wilson Park -- This town-owned park on West Main Street in Wickford contains a boat ramp, sports fields, basketball and tennis courts, a playground, and a short recreational path that winds around Mill Cove. Parking for trailered vehicles is available at the boat ramp at the end of Intrepid Drive. â€¢ Dock, picnic tables/benches, wildlife observation, trash receptacles Atlernate Departure Ramp is: RI State Ramp at Great Island Rd & State St Narragansett, RI 02882 (near Point Judith) Plan now is: Drive from Newton to Wickford Harbor, RI. Motor / Water ski the Bays. Exit the Newport area bays and head from Port Judith and cross a few miles of the Atlanic Ocean to Block Island. Lunch there, then back. This is an all day excursion. Share of costs maybe ~$30.00
item.name: WaterSki and Ocean Adventure to Block Island and Back.
